name: Tower of Agony
description:
Hi! I'm Arturo Bringas and i'd like to share a little game I've been working using Unity 5.

I've been a gamer all my life  and now i want to become a video game developer, i love to learn stuff related to video games and programming is my passion.

I got a major in IT, so programming has become my life for this past few years, but i come to realize that my real dream is to become a great game developer.

I'm only a programmer, so prefabs, behavior, coroutines, and animation events are mine, but audios and many assets are thanks to sketchfab.com and the asset store. 

This is a game still in development, so upgrades shall come later!

Please Send me an email: artur.aesir@gmail.com
